Body:
app = FakeApplication()
app.use_authentication().add(MockAuthHandler())
app.use_authorization().add(AdminsPolicy())
@auth('admin')
@app.router.get(b'/')
async def home():
    return None
app.prepare()
await app(get_example_scope('GET', '/'), MockReceive(), MockSend())
assert app.response.status == 401
pytest.mark.asyncio
